values.ctor:
<init>(name: String!)
            Creates a file output stream to write to the file with the specified name.

<init>(name: String!, append: Boolean)
            Creates a file output stream to write to the file with the specified name.

<init>(file: File!)
            Creates a file output stream to write to the file represented by the specified File object.

<init>(file: File!, append: Boolean)
            Creates a file output stream to write to the file represented by the specified File object.

<init>(fdObj: FileDescriptor!)
            Creates a file output stream to write to the specified file descriptor, which represents an existing connection to an actual file in the file system.

values.desc: Closes this file output stream and releases any system resources associated with this stream.
Returns the unique FileChannel object associated with this file output stream.
Returns the file descriptor associated with this stream.
Writes the specified byte to this file output stream.
Writes b.length bytes from the specified byte array to this file output stream.

values.code: write(b: ByteArray!, off: Int, len: Int)
values.desc: Writes len bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset off to this file output stream.
Cleans up the connection to the file, and ensures that the close method of this file output stream is called when there are no more references to this stream.
